00043 
00044 SlaveBoundaryVertices::SlaveBoundaryVertices( unsigned depth, unsigned dim )
00045   : elemDepth(depth), domainDoF(dim)
00046   {}
00047 
00048 std::string SlaveBoundaryVertices::get_name() const
00049   { return "SlaveBoundaryVertices"; }
00050 
00051 double SlaveBoundaryVertices::loop_over_mesh( Mesh* mesh, 
00052                                               MeshDomain* domain, 
00053                                               const Settings* settings,
00054                                               MsqError& err )
00055 {
00056   if (settings->get_slaved_ho_node_mode() != Settings::SLAVE_CALCULATED) {
00057     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Request to calculate higher-order node slaved status "
00058                     "when Settings::get_get_slaved_ho_node_mode() "
00059                     "!= SLAVE_CALCUALTED", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00060     return 0.0;
00061   }
00062   
00063     // If user said that we should treat fixed vertices as the
00064     // boundary, but specified that fixed vertices are defined
00065     // by the dimension of their geometric domain, then just
00066     // do distance from the geometric domain.
00067   int dim = this->domainDoF;
00068   if (dim >= 4 && settings->get_fixed_vertex_mode() != Settings::FIXED_FLAG)
00069     dim = settings->get_fixed_vertex_mode();
00070   
00071     // Create a map to contain vertex depth.  Intiliaze all to 
00072     // elemDepth+1.
00073   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> vertices;
00074   mesh->get_all_vertices( vertices, err );  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00075   if (vertices.empty())
00076     return 0.0;
00077   std::sort( vertices.begin(), vertices.end() );
00078   std::vector<unsigned short> depth( vertices.size(), elemDepth+1 );
00079   std::vector<bool> fixed;
00080   mesh->vertices_get_fixed_flag( arrptr(vertices), fixed, vertices.size(), err );
00081   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00082   
00083     // Initialize map with boundary vertices.
00084   if (dim >= 4) {
00085     for(size_t i = 0; i < vertices.size(); ++i)
00086       if (fixed[i])
00087         depth[i] = 0;
00088   }
00089   else {
00090     if (!domain) {
00091       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Request to calculate higher-order node slaved status "
00092                       "by distance from bounding domain without a domain.",
00093                       MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00094       return 0.0;
00095     }
00096     
00097     std::vector<unsigned short> dof( vertices.size() );
00098     domain->domain_DoF( arrptr(vertices), arrptr(dof), vertices.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00099     for (size_t i = 0; i < vertices.size(); ++i)
00100       if (dof[i] <= dim)
00101         depth[i] = 0;
00102   }
00103   
00104     // Now iterate over elements repeatedly until we've found all of the 
00105     // elements near the boundary.  This could be done much more efficiently
00106     // using vertex-to-element adjacencies, but it is to common for 
00107     // applications not to implement that unless doing relaxation smoothing.
00108     // This is O(elemDepth * elements.size() * ln(vertices.size()));
00109   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> elements;
00110   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle>::const_iterator j, k;
00111   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> conn;
00112   std::vector<size_t> junk(2);
00113   mesh->get_all_elements( elements, err );  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00114   if (elements.empty())
00115     return 0.0;
00116   bool some_changed;
00117   do {
00118     some_changed = false;
00119     for (j = elements.begin(); j != elements.end(); ++j) {
00120       conn.clear(); junk.clear();
00121       mesh->elements_get_attached_vertices( &*j, 1, conn, junk, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00122       unsigned short elem_depth = elemDepth+1;
00123       for (k = conn.begin(); k != conn.end(); ++k) {
00124         size_t i = std::lower_bound( vertices.begin(), vertices.end(), *k ) - vertices.begin();
00125         if (i == vertices.size()) {
00126           MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid vertex handle in element connectivity list.", 
00127                           MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00128           return 0.0;
00129         }
00130         if (depth[i] < elem_depth)
00131           elem_depth = depth[i];
00132       }
00133       if (elem_depth == elemDepth+1)
00134         continue;
00135       
00136       ++elem_depth;
00137       for (k = conn.begin(); k != conn.end(); ++k) {
00138         size_t i = std::lower_bound( vertices.begin(), vertices.end(), *k ) - vertices.begin();
00139         if (depth[i] > elem_depth) {
00140           depth[i] = elem_depth;
00141           some_changed = true;
00142         }
00143       }
00144     } // for(elements)
00145   } while (some_changed);
00146   
00147     // Now remove any corner vertices from the slaved set
00148   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle>::iterator p;
00149   std::vector<EntityTopology> types(elements.size());
00150   mesh->elements_get_topologies( arrptr(elements), arrptr(types), elements.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00151   for (j = elements.begin(); j != elements.end(); ++j) {
00152     const unsigned corners = TopologyInfo::corners(types[j-elements.begin()]);
00153     conn.clear(); junk.clear();
00154     mesh->elements_get_attached_vertices( &*j, 1, conn, junk, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00155     for (unsigned i = 0; i < corners; ++i) {
00156       p = std::lower_bound( vertices.begin(), vertices.end(), conn[i] );
00157       depth[p-vertices.begin()] = 0;
00158     }
00159   }
00160   
00161     // Now mark all vertices *not* within specified depth as slave vertices.
00162   std::vector<unsigned char> bytes( vertices.size() );
00163   mesh->vertices_get_byte( arrptr(vertices), arrptr(bytes), vertices.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00164   for (size_t i = 0; i < vertices.size(); ++i) {
00165     if (depth[i] <= elemDepth || fixed[i])
00166       bytes[i] &= ~MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT;
00167     else
00168       bytes[i] |= MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT;
00169   }
00170   
00171   mesh->vertices_set_byte( arrptr(vertices), arrptr(bytes), vertices.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00172   return 0.0;
00173 }

00175 void SlaveBoundaryVertices::initialize_queue( Mesh* ,
00176                                               MeshDomain* ,
00177                                               const Settings* ,
00178                                               MsqError&  )
00179 {
00180 }
